version_description:
Hey there, fellow travelholic! We’re super happy to bring you a brand-new mobile voucher that’ll turn the dreaded last-minute paper-ticket fumble into a thing of the past. Swipe through multiple vouchers even when you’re offline, share them with your travel buddies, and add it to your calendar for even greater ease.

But what if my booking doesn’t accept mobile vouchers, I hear you ask. Not a problem. We’ve also designed a pretty sweet in-app PDF voucher that you can show for entry. You can also easily print it from the app, if required.


Tell us what you think
We <3 reviews! Be sure to leave us one if you’re enjoying exploring the world with GetYourGuide.

Happy to help
We’re happy to help if you have any questions or encounter any issues. Simply head to our help page for further assistance: www.getyourguide.com/contact

Hey there, fellow travelholic! We’re super happy to bring you a brand-new mobile voucher that’ll turn the dreaded last-minute paper-ticket fumble into a thing of the past. Swipe through multiple vouchers even when you’re offline, share them with your travel buddies, and add it to your calendar for even greater ease.

But what if my booking doesn’t accept mobile vouchers, I hear you ask. Not a problem. We’ve also designed a pretty sweet in-app PDF voucher that you can show for entry. You can also easily print it from the app, if required.


Tell us what you think
We <3 reviews! Be sure to leave us one if you’re enjoying exploring the world with GetYourGuide.

Happy to help
We’re happy to help if you have any questions or encounter any issues. Simply head to our help page for further assistance: www.getyourguide.com/contact

In love with our new look? Join the club. Explore the app with ease and turn your travel dreams into reality one tap at a time. With GetYourGuide on your side (and in your pocket), creating memorable moments has never been easier.

We update our app every few weeks to ensure that searching for activities feels like being upgraded to first class. Here’s a quick overview of what the app team has been up to:

Bugs? Handled
Crashes? Banished
Interface? Beautified
Design? Refined

Has our hard work paid off? We love hearing from you. Leave us a review if you’re enjoying exploring the world with GetYourGuide.

Something not quite right with the app? Head over to our Help page for further assistance: www.getyourguide.com/contact

No account? No problem. If you can't access your mobile voucher, head to “Bookings” and tap “Can’t find your booking?” We'll send you a code to load the booking in the app. We’ve also updated the search function to make planning in advance a breeze.

Has our hard work paid off? We love hearing from you. Leave us a review if you’re enjoying exploring the world with GetYourGuide.

Something not quite right with the app? Head over to our Help page for further assistance: www.getyourguide.com/contact
